content: We have to register a URL callback for the authorization token in advance. Where does eCR Now app accept the token?

Sorry, that's a little vague, isn't it? We're able to reach the Allscripts FHIR server with the eCR Now app, which is ready to send a token, but we don't know where to send the token too. How do we figure out the callback URL so we can add it to the list of registered Redirect URI's?
@Nagesh Bashyam Anyone available this week to look into this as well?
